trans-unit.source: Updates a matrix with the product of itself and a translation matrix

seg-source.mrk: Updates a matrix with the product of itself and a translation matrix

target.mrk: Updates a matrix with the product of itself and a translation matrix

trans-unit.source: Amount of pixels to add along the x-axis

seg-source.mrk: Amount of pixels to add along the x-axis

target.mrk: Amount of pixels to add along the x-axis

trans-unit.source: Amount of pixels to add along the y-axis

seg-source.mrk: Amount of pixels to add along the y-axis

target.mrk: Amount of pixels to add along the y-axis

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies the order of the multiplication:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the order of the multiplication:

target.mrk: Specifies the order of the multiplication:

trans-unit.source: True - Specifies that the translation matrix is on the left

seg-source.mrk: True - Specifies that the translation matrix is on the left

target.mrk: True - Specifies that the translation matrix is on the left

trans-unit.source: False - Specifies that the translation matrix is on the right

seg-source.mrk: False - Specifies that the translation matrix is on the right

target.mrk: False - Specifies that the translation matrix is on the right

trans-unit.source: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

seg-source.mrk: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

target.mrk: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

trans-unit.source: Move the matrix half the width and helf the height towards the center

seg-source.mrk: Move the matrix half the width and helf the height towards the center

target.mrk: Move the matrix half the width and helf the height towards the center

trans-unit.source: Draw around upper left corner of the GUI, but since we have translated the matrix the object will appear at the center of GUI

seg-source.mrk: Draw around upper left corner of the GUI, but since we have translated the matrix the object will appear at the center of GUI

target.mrk: Draw around upper left corner of the GUI, but since we have translated the matrix the object will appear at the center of GUI
